## CommunityMessenger.publish() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
publish(topic: string, payload: Uint8Array): Promise<unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  topic | <code>string</code> | the topic to broadcast to (the community topic, not the pubsub topic) |
|  payload | <code>Uint8Array</code> | the data to send |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<unknown>`
